lead_paragraph: Cathrine Kraayeveld tied a career high with 22 points and grabbed 10 rebounds last night as the visiting Liberty defeated the Chicago Sky, 79-72, to snap a franchise-record 11-game losing streak. The Liberty improved to 5-20. The Sky (3-21) lost its seventh consecutive game. Becky Hammon, the Liberty’s leading scorer, missed her seventh straight game with a sprained left ankle.
